translations: n．假装，伪装：为了掩饰真实意图或情况而采取的虚假表现。
· He dropped all pretences and admitted his guilt.
他放弃了所有伪装，承认了自己的罪行。

sentences.sentence: This interview was conducted under false pretences.
sentences.translation: 这次采访是以欺骗手段进行的。

sentences.sentence: She was accused of obtaining money under false pretences.
I hate such shallow false pretences.
sentences.translation: 我讨厌这种肤浅，虚伪的做作。
